attributes.action: financially discourage the purchase of wastefully large cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A system [either by taxation or provision of Proof of Need] designed to discourage an individual or family buying a car (or cars) larger or more powerful than they need: Based on all the members of their household, work requirements and for their essential travel needs, would reduce road congestion AND polution. Smaller cars would also cause less road wear, thus reducing road tax, and a lighter car is less dangerous in a collision.
